attributes.action: Make sure in future that at least the highlights are transmitted on free to air terrestrial TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the recent screening of away England qualifiers on Setanta sports - a subscription channel - we feel that many people have not been given the opportunity to see England away World Cup qualifiers.

This is especially bad since there are no highlights on free to air - terrestrial channels such as BBC or ITV.

We the undersigned respectfully request that government request the FA, Setantam, and either BBC or ITV to remedy this as soon as possible.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
